name: In Your Eyes
description:
自然被人的双眼照亮。 
 在文明还未成熟以前，我们投向世界的目光天真而澄澈。 当我们试图从瞬息万变的宇宙中寻找秩序与规律时，颜色被捕捉，化为颜料、概念、数字、价值、代码。 

颜色是自然的吗？
颜色是人工的吗？ 

我们的双眼还能被自然照亮吗？ 

*游戏内的文案和视频部分通过AI技术生成

操作方式：

鼠标点击+【A】，【D】左右移动

安装方式：解压就能玩

若出现黑屏&卡屏的问题可能是由于视频文件编码问题，目前还在尝试修复中 "When you have not seen this flower, this flower and your heart are both in the same position of being deserted."

Nature is illuminated by the eyes of man. Before civilization was mature, we cast our eyes on the world with innocence and clarity. As we tried to find order and knowledge in a rapidly changing universe, colors were captured and transformed into pigments, concepts, numbers, values, and codes. 

Are colors natural? Are colors artificial? Can our eyes still be illuminated by nature?

*Text and video within the game are partially generated through AI technology 

How to operate: Mouse click + [A], [D] move left and right

Installation: Just unzip and play If there is a black screen & stuck screen problem it may be due to video file encoding problem, we are still trying to fix it
